title: GxSTxV
author: GxSTxV
created_time: September 08, 2022, 10:04:44 PMLast edit: September 10, 2022, 12:14:49 AM by GxSTxV
content: I don’t have that good knowledge about mining just few basic things and that i can mine using different devices and each device with a specific power and also how easy the coin we trying to mine. I saw that new blockchains can be profitable in their first start because it’s easy to mine it even using an average device. So i want to know what do i need to start mining. I didn’t want to mention the new blockchain but I’m sure it’s obvious so if someone has a video tutorial or a simple way i will be thankful

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: There is no new blockchain if you talking about Bitcoin and mining Bitcoin with ASIC is easy to set up you don't need to build a rig just like mining altcoins.If you talking about Altcoin mining then this is not the right place to talk about try to ask it here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=160.0

comments.author: rdluffy
comments.body: I think you're asking how to mine new coins, right?Quote from: GxSTxV on September 08, 2022, 10:04:44 PM I didn’t want to mention the new blockchain Maybe you found a new coin and want to mine first, before more people enter...If this is the case, you'll find what you need on official websites, usually new coins have their own website and official info about, on medium, github, discord etc, you need to find and almost sure there will be a tutorial or people discussing how to do.This is the way

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: Yes it is a new altcoin, and when entered their chat i found that people talking about mining it and how easy it was to do but nobody was mentioning or talking about a tutorial, they have like details and settings to set in order to mine i need tutorial where to put all that in a simple way. Just like starting a command  task on my device beside my wallet.

comments.author: Lafu
comments.body: Quote from: GxSTxV on September 09, 2022, 01:00:55 AMYes it is a new altcoin, and when entered their chat i found that people talking about mining it and how easy it was to do but nobody was mentioning or talking about a tutorial, they have like details and settings to set in order to mine i need tutorial where to put all that in a simple way. Just like starting a command  task on my device beside my wallet.You have to know first what kind of algo the Altcoin has , is it scrypt algo or other one ?Mostly you need different devices (Miners) for other algos , there are just a few that can handl a few algo in one.If you want to mine with a GPU mostly the miner software has the basic starting command in there foulders.

comments.author: rdluffy
comments.body: Quote from: GxSTxV on September 09, 2022, 01:00:55 AMYes it is a new altcoin, and when entered their chat i found that people talking about mining it and how easy it was to do but nobody was mentioning or talking about a tutorial, they have like details and settings to set in order to mine i need tutorial where to put all that in a simple way. Just like starting a command  task on my device beside my wallet.I know you probably already did, but have you checked on youtube and google like this: "example" coin how to mine...?As user above said, do you know whick algo this coins uses?At least we can have some clube to help you which way to go

comments.author: JayDDee
comments.body: So you want help from others but you don't want to share what you know with those that would help you.If you want to keep secrets you have to figure shit out yourself.

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: It’s a mainnet shell script to run a full node, i just found it on their website thanks to your help.But I don’t really know what to edit on it or even if it’s safe for my deviceCode:……….echo "what is your directory?"read directoryNameecho "Please enter miner address for this Node"read minerAddressecho "Enter bootNode address with IP"read bootNodeecho "Enter port no"read PortNomkdir $directoryNamecd $directoryNamebesu --data-path=data --genesis-file=………..If someone can explain from where i get for example the no port and my directory, I looked on google and youtube the coin is very new and nobody made a tutorial for it yet.__________________________________________________________________________Quote from: JayDDee on September 09, 2022, 01:59:06 AMSo you want help from others but you don't want to share what you know with those that would help you.If you want to keep secrets you have to figure shit out yourself.I didn’t say that I don’t want to share or keep this thing for myself, i said it’s obvious on which coin i was talking about, it is no secret and benefits if keeping it a secret

comments.author: rdluffy
comments.body: On their website, they don't explain well in my opinion, but I found on Whitepaper: Whitepaper source: https://qiblockchain.online/images/QI_Blockchain_Whitepaper_V2.pdfSo I searched on their website again and found this explanation:https://docs.qiblockchain.online/build-and-api/run-a-qi-blockchain-full-nodeI think this is what you're looking for
